  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3125</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3125</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Literatura. Quin drama!</string>
            <string language="en">Literature. What drama!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur. Welches Drama!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littérature. Quel drame !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Literatura. Que drama!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Letteratura. Che dramma!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνία. Ποιο δράμα!</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs interactiu que tracta dels drames al segle XIX, en plena revolució industrial, on convivien romàntics, burgesos i revolucionaris. S'hi estudien les característiques dels drames, l'heroïcitat dels desarrelats, el teatre d'Ibsen i la obra de Puig i Ferreter. Textos de "Terra baixa" d'Àngel Guimerà i "Aigües encantades" de Puig i Ferreter. Activitats d'autoavaluació per a la pràctica dels continguts de la unitat.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource on 19th century drama: industrial revolution, the middle class, romantics, and revolutionaries. It studies the characteristics of drama, the heroism of the rootless, and the plays of Ibsen and Puig i Ferreter. Sample texts from Àngel Guimerà's "Lowlands" or "Martha of the Lowlands", and Puig i Ferreter's "Enchanted Waters". Self-assessment activities are also included for practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">obra dramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">dramatic play</string>
            <string language="es">obra dramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary genre</string>
            <string language="es">género literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
            <string language="es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">arts escèniques</string>
            <string language="en">performing arts</string>
            <string language="es">artes escénicas</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel auf 19. Jahrhundertdrama: 
industrielle Revolution, die mittlere Kategorie, romantics und 
Revolutionäre. Es studiert die Eigenschaften des Dramas, den 
Heroism vom rootless und die Spiele von Ibsen und von Puig I Ferreter.
Prüfen Sie Texte Àngel Guimeràs "von den Tiefländern" oder 
"von Martha der Tiefländer" und Puig I Ferreters "verzaubertes 
Wasser". Selbstbewertung Aktivitäten sind auch für Praxis 
eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource interactive sur le 19ème drame de siècle : 
révolution industrielle, la bourgeoisie, romantics, et 
révolutionnaires. Il étudie les caractéristiques du drame, le
héroisme du rootless, et les jeux d'Ibsen et de Puig i Ferreter. 
Échantillonnez les textes des "terres en contre-bas" de Àngel 
Guimerà ou de "Martha des terres en contre-bas", et les eaux 
"enchantées" de Puig i Ferreter. Des activités de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sont également incluses pour la pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso interativo no 1ø drama do século: volta 
industrial, a classe média, romantics, e revolucionários. 
Estuda as características do drama, o heroism do rootless, e os
jogos de Ibsen e de Puig i Ferreter. Prove textos das 
"planícies" de Àngel Guimerà ou do "Martha das planícies", e 
águas "enchanted" de Puig i Ferreter. As atividades do 
self-assessment são incluídas também para a prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa interattiva sul diciannovesimo dramma di secolo: 
giro industriale, il codice categoria centrale, romantics e 
rivoluzionari. Studia le caratteristiche del dramma, il heroism 
del rootless ed i giochi di Ibsen e di Puig i Ferreter. Provi i 
testi "dalle pianure" di Àngel Guimerà o "da Martha delle pianure" e
le acque "incantate" di Puig i Ferreter. Le attività di 
valutazione di se stesso egualmente sono incluse per pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς στο δράμα του 19$ου 
αιώνα: βιομηχανική επανάσταση, η μέση κλάση, romantics, 
και revolutionaries. Μελετά τα χαρακτηριστικά του 
δράματος, τον ηρωισμό rootless, και τα παιχνίδια Ibsen και 
puig ι Ferreter. Κείμενα δείγματα από τα "πεδινά" 
ΐngel Guimerΰ ή "Martha των πεδινών", και puig ι 
"ύδατα Enchanted" Ferreter. Οι δραστηριότητες 
αυτοαξιολόγησης συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης για την πρακτική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">drastisches Spiel</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">literarisches Genre</string>
